title: Woman has Beyoncé themed wedding – and we’re crazy in love for it!
text:
Before her fiancé put a ring on it, this Beyoncé fan wanted to know just how much her beau knew about Queen B.

In 2015 Allie Davis from Chicago made her then-boyfriend and now-husband Ty, take a Beyoncé quiz.

After passing the test with flying colours, the couple officially said “I do” in a Queen Bey themed wedding, The Sun reported.

READ MORE: Bride shocks wedding guests with 63kg weight loss for her big day

“I gave my boyfriend a Beyoncé exam to make sure we can stay together. He passed,” she captioned pictures on Twitter of the test which Ty passed with a whopping 88%.

I gave my boyfriend a Beyoncé exam to make sure we can stay together. He passed. pic.twitter.com/Lqv3VEKWFx — Allie (#1 Bigger Stan) (@Fergyonce) April 6, 2015

The 25-year-old Beyoncé superfan made sure that her Queen Bey themed wedding was nothing short of perfect.



“My husband, family, and the wedding party walked down to Halo and I walked down to his cousin singing Ave Maria,” she said.

Even Allie’s decorations were filled with the songstress' references.

“My mom made candles for all the guests with beehives on them (for Beyhive),” she revealed.

READ MORE: Biker stops ex on the way to her wedding

“Our cake topper was a giant B (for our last name but I told my husband that it really stands for Beyoncé and he always rolls his eyes at that),” she added.

Sources: The Sun, Twitter,Instagram, Buzzfeed
description: Before her fiancé put a ring on it, this Beyoncé fan wanted to know just how much her beau knew about Queen B.
